item.title: Just one-liner solution playing YouTube video on Shoes!
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
# sample59-1.rbShoes.app(:width => 400, :height => 300){video \"http://jp.youtube.com/get_video?video_id=8hBrRZuXjHA&t=\OEgsToPDskKhuXfknhF5eWPOvhe-nw5P", :autoplay => true}

Shoes can get and control a video data by Shoes::Video object. Cool! B-)

I referred to the following web site. Thank you so much.
GUIfy your Ruby apps with Shoes

Regards,
ashbb

ps. For more information, see the Shoes Tutorial Note. :)
